name: Manish Singh 0002
content: Manish Singh Manish Singh Associate Professor Computer Science and Engineering IIT Hyderabad Office: CS-512, CSE Building Kandi - 502284, Sangareddy Telangana, India msingh [at] cse.iith.ac.in I am a faculty member in the CSE Department at IIT Hyderabad. My research interest is in the area of Data Mining, Information Retrieval, Databases and NLP. I work on problems related to Information Exploration, Relationship Extraction, Social Network Analysis, Recommendation Systems, Healthcare Data Analysis. You can see my publications here at DBLP and Google Scholar. I teach Vedic knowledge from scriptures such as Bhagavad-gita and Srimad Bhagavatam. If you want to attend the online discussions, then join this WhatsApp channel.
